hero.paragraph: A software developer creating web and mobile applications, also working on machine learning

kopernik: Developed and maintained 6+ responsive, multi-language corporate websites using HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and React.
Implemented custom email templates with HTML for marketing and communication purposes
Built a dedicated event management website for the companyâ€™s internal use, including UI design and frontend logic.
Ensured cross-browser compatibility and mobile responsiveness across all developed websites.
Contributed to the ongoing maintenance and updates of client projects, fixing bugs and optimizing performance.
lfu: Developed a drag-and-drop form builder application using React and Tailwind CSS, handling both the UI design and functional logic.
Designed and implemented responsive user interfaces to ensure optimal performance across various screen sizes and devices.
Utilized Tailwind CSS to create clean, consistent, and scalable styles across all components.
Contributed to the maintenance and improvement of ongoing projects by fixing bugs and refactoring code for better performance.
Collaborated with team members to review code and implement UI/UX enhancements based on feedback.
wsolv: Built a responsive and feature-rich dashboard using Next.js and Material UI, focusing on clean design and performance.
Implemented global state management with Redux JS to ensure consistent data flow across components.
Integrated Facebook, Instagram, and LinkedIn APIs to fetch and manage user data within the dashboard.
Developed secure Express.js middleware, including API rate limiting, to handle backend logic and protect endpoints.
Connected to a PostgreSQL database to perform CRUD operations and manage relational data effectively.
